alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 8:13AM MST until November 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches Lolo to Lolo Pass, 6 to 8 inches Skalkaho Pass, Painted Rocks region, Sula and Lost Trail Pass. * WHERE...Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
